# Hyvä Themes - Locale it_IT

[![Hyvä Themes](https://hyva.io/media/wysiwyg/logo-compact.png)](https://hyva.io/)

This module provides the it_IT locale translations for Hyvä Themes.

## Installation

### For Hyvä License Holders

```sh
composer require hyva-themes/i18n-it-it
bin/magento setup:upgrade
```

Be sure to also configure the Italian locale it_IT in the admin for your Hyvä store front.

### For Development

```
composer config repositories.hyva-themes/i18n-it-it git git@gitlab.hyva.io:hyva-themes/internationalization/i18n-it-it.git
composer require hyva-themes/i18n-it-it:dev-main
bin/magento setup:upgrade
```

Be sure to also configure the Italian locale it_IT in the admin for your Hyvä store front.
